EmailTemplate.subject: Your Voice Matters: Beginning Tomorrow Participate in the HealthiestYou by Teladoc Annual Client Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Our annual client survey launches tomorrow, and your feedback plays a crucial role in our ongoing commitment to making better health possible for all.
On September 12th, you will receive another email from me, inviting you to participate in our brief, 5-minute survey. Your insights are invaluable to us, and I encourage you to take a moment to share your thoughts. Your input will help us drive positive change and ensure that HealthiestYou by Teladoc continues to meet your and your members’ needs effectively.
Participation in last year's survey made a significant impact, leading to accomplishments that have benefited members, clients, and partners. Together, we are shaping a future where healthcare is more accessible, efficient, and member-centered. I look forward to your participation and feedback in the upcoming survey. Best regards,
Pat Sir President – Small Group Markets Teladoc Health About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
